resources.string: Permission Approved!, press button to activate sleep mode
Sample requires Activity Recognition permissions to function.

1. The selected challenge cannot be canceled once chosen.\n2. Users must sleep according to the designated time, failure to do so will result in automatic challenge failure.

Turu, a platform that helps users track their sleep schedule and journal their dreams. Turu incorporates a unique "sleep to earn" business model that rewards users for following their sleep schedule and achieving their sleep goals.
